name: swarm

effect.sword-shield: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

effect.the-crown-tundra: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
